```{r}
heart <- function(name){
  t = seq(0,60,len=100)
  plot(c(-8,8),c(0,15),type='n',axes=FALSE,xlab='',ylab='')
  x = -.01*(-t^2+40*t+1200)*sin(pi*t/180)
  y = .01*(-t^2+40*t+1200)*cos(pi*t/180)
  lines(x,y, lwd=4)
  lines(-x,y, lwd=4)
  text(0,8,"Love You",col="steelblue",cex=2.5)
  text(0,5.5,name,col="steelblue",cex=2.5)
}


heart("Alger!!!")

```
